lines.text: I mean, Slick's the one holding it. Doesn't that nail it down?
Not quite. If one of the wizards used it, they coulda planted it in the victim's hands.
Classic move, tryin' to make a murder look like a suicide.
What about fingerprints? Can we check the gun to see if anyone else used it?
The gun was caught in the flame along with Slick, s-so... well.
Fingerprints are the residue left by- by skin oil, and that oil would've burned away.
Oh. Dang. I guess... that's another reason they started the fire, maybe?
And we can't check for prints, because of the fire. Dangit.
